books.author: by Bill Browder
books.description: The author of “Red Notice” tells his story of becoming Vladimir Putin’s enemy by uncovering a $230 million tax refund scheme.
books.name: FREEZING ORDER

books.author: by Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery.
books.name: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: by Molly Shannon with Sean Wilsey
books.description: The comedic actor shares stories of family tragedy and her years as a star of “Saturday Night Live.”
books.name: HELLO, MOLLY!

books.author: by Delia Ephron
books.description: The author and screenwriter describes losing her sister and husband to cancer, finding love again and receiving a leukemia diagnosis.
books.name: LEFT ON TENTH

books.author: by Susan Cain
books.description: The author of “Quiet” suggests ways to embrace loss and suffering within ourselves and others.
books.name: BITTERSWEET

books.author: by David Mamet
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning playwright lambastes liberal politics, cancel culture and other things he finds objectionable.
books.name: RECESSIONAL

books.author: by Bill Browder
books.description: An American hedge fund manager in Russia is expelled by kleptocrats who then seize his property. Browder's investigation into the death of his attorney led to the Magnitsky Act.
books.name: RED NOTICE

books.author: by Michelle Zauner
books.description: The daughter of a Korean mother and Jewish-American father, and leader of the indie rock project Japanese Breakfast, describes creating her own identity after losing her mother to cancer.
books.name: CRYING IN H MART

books.author: by Wil Wheaton
books.description: The star of “Stand by Me” and “Star Trek: The Next Generation” revisits and updates his 2004 collection of blog posts.
books.name: STILL JUST A GEEK

books.author: by Natalie Haynes
books.description: A re-examination of Greek myths and their female characters through a woman’s perspective.
books.name: PANDORA'S JAR

books.author: by Dave Grohl
books.description: A memoir by the musician known for his work with Foo Fighters and Nirvana.
books.name: THE STORYTELLER

books.author: by Matthew McConaughey
books.description: The Academy Award-winning actor shares snippets from the diaries he kept over the last 35 years.
books.name: GREENLIGHTS

books.author: by bell hooks
books.description: The late feminist icon explores the causes of a polarized society and the meaning of love.
books.name: ALL ABOUT LOVE

books.author: edited by Nikole Hannah-Jones, Caitlin Roper, Ilena Silverman and Jake Silverstein
books.description: Viewing America’s entanglement with slavery and its legacy, in essays adapted and expanded from The New York Times Magazine.
books.name: THE 1619 PROJECT

books.author: by Erik Larson
books.description: An examination of the leadership of the prime minister Winston Churchill.
books.name: THE SPLENDID AND THE VILE
